page.title: 08A SCHOOL DAY IN A-IN-M
page.content:
I live at 33, Skelton Street, Bryn. I get up at 7.15 am to go to school. I set out from home at 8.20 am and arrive at school at about 8.35 am. Our school is split into two blocks an old block where all the first and second years are and a new block where all the third, fourth and fifth years are. Also there is a big leisure centre.
We have different lessons in different blocks. We have a break at 10.35 am which ends at 10.50 am and then it's dinner at 12 noon, which ends at 1.00 pm and then another break at 2.20 pm which ends at 2.35 pm. School finishes at 3.45 pm. When I get home I change out of my uniform into different clothes.Then I do my homework,then I go out to play football.
